1.Title: Sprouting Core
1.Description: Increases CRIT Rate by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>. When the equipper deals DMG with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, they gain 1 stack of a buff. Each stack increases the equipper's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>12.5%</color>, up to 2 stacks. Each stack lasts 40s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately. Can trigger once per use of a skill. At 2 stacks, the wearer's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG ignore <color=#2BAD00>20%</color> of enemy DEF.
